title: Yoru wo Tomenaide
description:
A collection of stories:

[*] Don't Stop the Night
A salaryman is suddenly transferred to a side branch of his company. When he sits listlessly at the train station he meets a young woman who doesn't have much will to live. What is her intention when she invites him to stay at an inn together?

[*] Transient Flower
Saya has undertaken plastic surgery, and now is popular with men, however, she seems to be unsatisfied with herself. What exactly was her reason to undertake the plastic surgery...?

[*] Fleeting Things

[*] Fluttering

[*] Shampoo, Rinse, Conditioner

[*] White Secret

matches.title: Totsuzen desu ga, Kyou Ai ni Kite
Ano Ko ni Yasashii Sekai ga Ii
Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta
